statements: SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM user_roles_permissions;
SELECT permission, role, user_id FROM user_roles_permissions;
SELECT * FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE permission = 'read';
SELECT role, permission FROM user_roles_permissions ORDER BY role DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles_permissions ORDER BY user_id ASC, role DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE role = 'admin' AND permission = 'write'
SELECT user_id, role FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE permission = 'read'
SELECT user_id, permission FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE role = 'editor'
SELECT * FROM user_roles_permissions WHERE role = 'admin' OR role = 'editor'
SELECT user_id, role, permission FROM user_roles_permissions
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, password FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_id = 5;
SELECT user_id AS id, username AS name FROM users;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT * FROM users INNER JOIN permissions ON users.user_id = permissions.permission_id;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username LIKE '%a%' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM users WHERE username = 'admin';
SELECT user_id, username, role_name FROM users INNER JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id;
SELECT permission_id, permission_name FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE '%read%';
SELECT * FROM roles ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT role_id, role_name FROM roles WHERE role_name LIKE '%admin%';
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.username = 'john_doe';

SELECT users.username, roles.role_name, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id JOIN permissions ON roles.role_name = permissions.permission_name ORDER BY users.username ASC, roles.role_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_roles FROM roles;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role = 'admin';
SELECT id, username FROM users ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT role_name FROM roles WHERE id = 3;
SELECT user_id, role_id FROM user_roles WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE role='admin';
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE id=1;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id=user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id=roles.id;
SELECT users.username, permissions.permission_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.id=user_roles.user_id JOIN roles ON user_roles.role_id=roles.id JOIN permissions ON roles.id=permissions.id;
SELECT username, role FROM users WHERE role='admin' ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles ORDER BY role_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE role_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM permissions WHERE permission_name LIKE 'read%';
SELECT user_id, username, role_id FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM roles;
SELECT role_name, role_id FROM roles WHERE role_id < 5 ORDER BY role_name DESC;
SELECT users.username, roles.role_name FROM users JOIN roles ON users.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE users.user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id AS UserID, COUNT(permission_id) AS TotalPermissions FROM user_permissions GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(permission_id) > 2;

SELECT permissions.permission_name, roles.role_name FROM role_permissions JOIN permissions ON role_permissions.permission_id = permissions.permission_id JOIN roles ON role_permissions.role_id = roles.role_id WHERE permissions.permission_id = 3 ORDER BY role_name DESC, permission_name ASC;
